text: Ej mardum, Allohro ito'at kuned dar on ci ʙa sumo farmudaast va az on ci sumoro man' kardaast va pajomʙarro ito'at kuned dar on ci ʙa sumo az coniʙi Parvardigoraton ovardaast. Pas, agar az to'ati Alloh va rasulas sumo ruj gardoned, pas, haroina, ʙa firistodai Mo zarare nest az ruj gardonidani sumo, zero ʙaroi u hec vazifae cuz rasonidani pajomi oskor nest
